newsitem.title: USA: Enamelon gets two U.S. patents.
newsitem.headline: Enamelon gets two U.S. patents.

text.p: Enamelon Inc said on Tuesday that it has received two additional oral care patents from the U.S. Trademark and Patent Office.
The patents cover remineralization technology that could be applied to a broad range of oral care products, such as toothpaste, lozenges and professional dental treatments, the company said.

Enamelon said its anti-cavity fluoride toothpaste remains on tract to enter the test market this quarter. The company's remineralization process attempts to stop cavities before they begin, Enamelon said.
